summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rapid Pin system. All 21 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend dashboard, season detail page, and dialogs all working correctly. Rapid Pin button visible in PinpanClub navigation. i18n translations complete.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons - Returns all seasons (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons?active_only=true - Returns only active seasons
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons/{season_id} - Returns season details with prizes
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons/nonexistent - Returns 404
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons - Requires admin auth (401)
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches - Registers match with pending status
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches - Validates 3 different participants
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches - Validates winner must be player
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches - Validates registrant must be participant
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches/{id}/confirm - Confirms by different participant
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches/{id}/confirm - Rejects same registrant
Backend: POST /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches/{id}/confirm - Rejects non-participant
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/matches/{id} - Returns match details
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons/{id}/matches - Returns season matches
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons/{id}/ranking - Returns player ranking table
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/seasons/{id}/ranking/referees - Returns referee ranking
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/rapidpin/scoring - Returns scoring config (victory=3, defeat=1, referee=2)
Backend: Points are 0 when match is pending
Backend: Points applied after confirmation (victory=3, defeat=1, referee=2)
Frontend: Rapid Pin dashboard loads with header and info cards
Frontend: Info cards show 2+1 participants, +3/+1/+2 scoring, 1 confirmation
Frontend: Seasons list shows 'Diciembre 2025' with stats
Frontend: Season card shows matches count, players count, status badge
Frontend: New Season button opens create dialog
Frontend: Create Season dialog has name, description, start/end date fields
Frontend: Season detail page loads with header and stats cards
Frontend: Stats cards show Matches, Players, Referees, Pending counts
Frontend: Ranking tab shows player ranking table with Points, GP, W, L, Ref columns
Frontend: Player ranking shows El Rayo (8pts), JP (5pts), La Pantera (3pts), Anita (2pts)
Frontend: Referee Ranking tab shows referees with matches refereed and points
Frontend: Matches tab shows recent matches with scores and validation status
Frontend: Register Match button opens dialog
Frontend: Register Match dialog has Player A, Player B, Referee, Winner selectors
Frontend: Register Match dialog has Winner Score and Loser Score inputs
Frontend: Register Match dialog shows pending confirmation warning
Frontend: Rapid Pin button visible in PinpanClub navigation bar
Frontend: Rapid Pin button navigates to /pinpanclub/rapidpin
i18n: Spanish translations complete for rapidpin namespace
critical_code_review_comments: Consider adding data-testid attributes to more elements for better automated testing (season cards, ranking rows, etc.)
seed_data_creation: Test matches created during backend testing. Season 'Diciembre 2025' (rps_a4f4bd471c8c) now has 3 validated matches with 4 players and 3 referees.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Rapid Pin system fully tested. Key endpoints: GET/POST /rapidpin/seasons, POST /rapidpin/matches, POST /rapidpin/matches/{id}/confirm, GET /rapidpin/seasons/{id}/ranking, GET /rapidpin/seasons/{id}/ranking/referees. Scoring: victory=3, defeat=1, referee=2. Match validation requires confirmation by different participant. Frontend pages: /pinpanclub/rapidpin (dashboard), /pinpanclub/rapidpin/season/{id} (season detail with tabs). Players: Carlos (jugador_544167d88272), Mar√≠a (jugador_4a751551ad4b), Juan (jugador_3cb000147513), Ana (jugador_fc1be9bb2dc0). Test season: rps_a4f4bd471c8c.
